DOC.detailed_description: In study aim compare effect sedation provide propofol addition short-acting opioid alfentanil long-acting opioid fentanyl cognitive function , pain , side effect procedure endoscopist patient satisfaction . Following approval Kırıkkale University ethic committee , 150 patient age 18 65 ASA I-III schedule elective endoscopy colonoscopy enrol study . After obtain write informed consent , APAIS ( The Amsterdam Preoperative Anxiety Information Scale ) MMTS ( Mini Mental Test Scoring ) test give patient . Following TDT ( Trieger Dot Test ) DSST ( Digit Symbol Substitution Test ) , patient randomly allocate either Propofol-Alfentanil ( Group A ) , Propofol-Fentanyl ( Group F ) Propofol-Control ( Group P ) consist 50 patient . The patient Group A give 100 mcg/kg/min propofol infusion 10 mcg/kg load dose alfentanil 5 mcg/kg additional bolus alfentanil whenever FPS ( Faces Pain Scale ) great 3 patient tolerate procedure . The patient Group F give 100 mcg/kg/min propofol infusion 1 mcg/kg load dose fentanyl 5 mcg/kg additional bolus fentanyl whenever FPS ( Faces Pain Scale ) great 3 patient could tolerate procedure . Group P designate control group patient give 100mcg/kg/min infusion sedation achieve via 1 mg/kg propofol load dose 0.5 mg/kg propofol additional bolus give whenever patient tolerate procedure FPS great 3 . BIS value , mean arterial pressure , heart rate , peripheral oxygen saturation record three group . FPS VAS ( Visual Analogue Scale ) value evaluate . Patients intraprocedural desaturation , hypo- hypertension , brady- tachycardia , nausea , vomit apnea record . Total amount drug administer record . Infusions cease end procedure time OAAS/S exceed 3 record TDT DSST repeat 5 , 15 30th minute . Patient endoscopist satisfaction evaluate case .
